        Loops through one table of the database and reads the content
        Parameters:
        location - a string which filters the results after their location
        Returns:
        a list of Strings with all employee names
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when database connection close fails

                                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Loops through one table of the database and reads the content.
        Returns:
        a string containing all records of employeeTable

      • deleteRecordFromDatabase

        public static void deleteRecordFromDatabase(EmployeeDatabaseRecord record)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Deletes a given row of the employeeTable.
        Parameters:
        record - the record
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when database connection close() fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when null is passed as argument

      • updateRecordInDatabase

        public static void updateRecordInDatabase(EmployeeDatabaseRecord record)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                          java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                          java.lang.Exception
        Writes the given strings to the database.
        Parameters:
        record - the target record
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when database connection close() fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when employee or location is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the next free id is -1
        java.lang.Exception - when database setup fails
